name: Bloop (itch) (Unbansheee)
description:
Help Bloop reach his destination with the power of colour!

Controls:
WASD to move
SPACEBAR to jump
ESC or Q to open menu

Credits:
Vinnie Gray: Programming, Technical Lead
Jacob Boreham-Wright: Programming
Kate Carlman-Williams: Art, Sound, Level Design
Michael Rew: Music
Environment assets from Unreal Marketplace
